attributes.action: people with sickle cell anaemia should be able to claim sickle cell money
attributes.additional_details: Ask oscar sandwell they are a sickle cell anaemia charity that shows  people with sickle cell what it is and what its capable off but they will be closing soon because not many people konw about it so there not much funding
attributes.background: The main symptoms of sickle cell are painful episodes called sickle cell crises, which can be very severe and last up to a month and increased the risk of serious infection where red blood cells cannot carry enough oxygen around the body which can cause tiredness and shortness of breath and death

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. We aren't sure what you mean by "sickle cell money".

If you would like people with sickle cell anaemia to be exempt from prescription charges or more Government funding for research and awareness raising you could start a new petition about that.
